column4: hey guys, does anyone know why i cannot connect to ssh via my external IP?(connection refused) but ssh -v localhost works fine?
Have you forwarded the port on your router to the machine you're trying to access?
It is a work machine, so am not sure of the rules
To be able to access a machine via ssh from the internet, you will need to have the port forwarded from the router the machine, I don't think there's any other way you can do that
